title: need help playing league on my 46 inch tv
body: i just cracked my old tv (32in LG TV) so i went out and got a new 46in Haier TV and whenever i try to play league my screen goes blue (like there is no source) and i cant play. i can tell that the game itself is loading because i can hear people pinging and the narrator telling me of deaths. please help i just want to play league again

replies.body: Thank you for the help i can finally play again... you my friend deserve a medal.

> Thank you for the help i can finally play again... you my friend deserve a medal.

Glad to hear it man! Good luck and have fun on your new TV!
So what does repopulate mean? are you saying i should just redownload the game or will the repair function on the launcher work?

> So what does repopulate mean? are you saying i should just redownload the game or will the repair function on the launcher work?

No, the file will recreate itself when you launch the game again. You do not have to do anything but delete the file and launch the game like normal.
ok i just deleted the file and am trying it now

This is most likely happening because your new TV doesn't support the same resolution as your old TV. You could probably resolve this by deleting your game.cfg and letting it repopulate itself. You can find it on your hard drive at this location:
C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config\Game.cfg

If it automatically changes to a bigger resolution and doesn't work, you can put it in windowed mode after getting in game (Preferably a custom game so you don't have any issues with other people) by pressing ALT+Enter, then you should be able to adjust your settings accordingly.
